title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and Parmesan together, then mix with the pasta.
Toss everything together and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Make the sauce with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
Combine chicken and sauce, simmer for 10 minutes.
